attributes.description:
For more information on this vehicle please contact 0877252552. This vehicle comes with a balance of 3year/unlimited kms service plan, warranty and roadside assistance. Apart from being much more handsomely styled than its predecessor, the new BT-50 offers appreciably more appeal for buyers who want the practicality and looks of a bakkie, but ultimately utilise their vehicles as family cars. A 4-door pick-up will never be able to match the sophistication of a unibody SUV, but Mazda’s newcomer demonstrates that “leisure double-cab” standards are rising rapidly.

We deliver country wide, inhouse financing available.
The price excludes dealer fees and smash and grab protection film. Call us today to arrange a test drive. Errors and omissions Reserved.
T&Cs apply
